title: Entropy-driven signal amplification integrated with machine learning in multiplex lateral flow immunoassay for sensitive Point-of-Care colon cancer diagnosis.
abstract: Investigations on epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT) events occurring on circulating tumor cells (CTCs) are poised to significantly advance nanoliquid biopsy methodologies. This study presented a colorimetric multiplex lateral flow immunoassay strip (mLFIA) for the simultaneous detection of EpCAM and Vimentin, two representative EMT biomarkers, on heterogeneous CTCs.
